website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a tactical flashlight with emergency features, this is a good choice.
pros: Durable waterproof aluminum design that can handle temperature extremes
Three brightness modes plus SOS and strobe
cons: On-off switch is not as durable as the body of the flashlight

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight broke after 2 weeks use. First the on off button shifted and was not functional. Next the spring between the batter pack and light bulb broke off. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in a few days! Could not believe ...
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart in a few days! Could not believe it. The product was all it claimed to be for it's short life. Tried to return it, but got no response. : (
customer_reviews.author: ChakaTania

customer_reviews.title: Probably the worst purchase made in the past 10 years
customer_reviews.text: Probably the worst purchase made in the past 10 years. While the body of the flashlight is sturdy, the on-off switch broke after one week. It is a very flimsy switch. I would never buy another product like this
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Lousy product that can fixed!!!!!!!.
customer_reviews.text: It broke the end of December. Had not used it much except to check it out. Used it and button, on and off button begin to stick. Worked with i and could never went to Home Depot and we could never get it to work again. Never could fix it. Malfunction with on and off switch. Too expensive to not be up set. Bad design or something. I want a credit or replacement. You must stand behind your peoduct. Also it was not run over by a large truck. Or frozen in ice. P Ohhh....... Dear made a mistake by using it !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann R. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Not Bright Enough
customer_reviews.text: At first, the light is very bright and shines a great distance. However, within a week or so, it dimmed quite a bit, even with new batteries installed. I don't believe it is as strong as the "As Seen On TV" flashlight. I was a little disappointed in it even though it is constructed very well and seems to be heavy duty as far as the material. The flashing setting and the SOS setting work very well, but you can only barely touch the switch. If you click it too hard, it just turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: For the price I would expect better. Would NOT recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a travel flashlight. On my first trip to India the flashlight broke. For the price I would expect better. Would NOT recommend this product. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Simon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my wife and did not work, battery compartment faulty. Do not purchase poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Stumpie

customer_reviews.title: Not bright at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: This light is not bright at all!! Cheapie flashlight from the supermarket check out was brighter than this! Usually I take one star reviews with a grain of salt. But I really wish I would have listened to them this time. :(
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: On-Off Mechanism Broke After Minimal Use
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the Taclight less than 2 months and have only used it rarely and for short periods. Last night, I was unable to turn the light off, finding that the control button had detached and would only allow me to go from function to function. I now have an expensive flashlight that I can't turn on and off. The commercials tout its durability, but I don't want to freeze it or run over it. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: What we received is a copy of a genuine Bell and Howell taclight.
customer_reviews.text: The taclight we received is a copy and not an actual Bell and Howell taclight. We have the original and it is much heavier and of superior quality. Also it came in plain white packaging and not as pictured. In the picture the package on the left is our original taclight and the package on the right is what we recently received through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: w. r.

customer_reviews.title: My husband is happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tac light as a surprise for my husband. He is disabled and immobile. It's important to him to have a dependable flashlight handy in case of power outages, which can happen frequently depending on the weather here. He was/is thrilled with the light. I can vouch for it's brightness. I don't think I've ever seen a reasonably priced light so bright! I doubt we'll ever need to know how water proof it is so that isn't an issue for us. I liked the price, he likes the product. It is a sturdy little light too.
customer_reviews.author: JulieV

customer_reviews.title: but what I do not like is when batteries get low it just shuts completely ...
customer_reviews.text: The light is decent enough, but what I do not like is when batteries get low it just shuts completely off instead of getting dim like all other flashlights do. So your out at night walking along with a nice bright light then all the sudden NOTHING, your just in the dark and if you do not carry batteries with you for this situation your just so out of luck. So this is stupid as far as I am concerned and makes this almost junk to me. They need to let it go dim so you know your about to lose the light and can get some batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this light.
customer_reviews.text: This light is trash. It's not as bright as they show on the box and the switch broke the 3rd time I turned it on. The switch literally broke through the cylinder housing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a piece of crap. Ordered two. One broke after the fifth use. Totally unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Moran

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this two stars as it is not a "Bell + Howell 1176 " taclight, it is a knock off, delivered from a mailing address in China, with a brand name Ultra Fire on the flashlight. I own two Bell+ Howell taclights', the quality of this knock off is not the same. Buyer beware, if you think you are ordering a Bell+Howell Taclight high performance flashlight this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Solid

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is defective but I threw away the packaging in order to fit it into a stocking. it starts out very bright and fades down to very dim within a minute of being on. I tried a second set of new batteries in the event that the batteries were faulty but it is the flashlight. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C.

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This was so disappointing. I bought this for my husband for Father's Day. The ad for it was wonderful. I couldn't wait for it to come because he has to take the dogs out in the back yard late at night. His flashlight can't reach the end of the yard in some places. So this would be such a treat. Well, it came and he couldn't even get it to stay on. He sent it back. Very sad. That ad should be removed!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Highly Disappointed - I can't get this to work at all. It doesn't arrive as shown, it came in a plain white box with no instructions. I've put the batteries in and tried to light this flashlight every way I can think of using the push button on the end, and it won't light up. So much for a cool father's day gift - this is going back today.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie582

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this
customer_reviews.text: This is not an official Bell and Howell Taclight, I have two or these and two official taclight and there is no comparison the official ones are a lot brighter than these. I have no problem paying for any product just don't sell me an off brand product that came in some bubble wrap in a Bell and Howell box that looked as if it was left outside in the rain! The official taclight comes in a sealed plastic package.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Just another flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Is just about the same brightness is any other LED flashlight I've ever had
customer_reviews.author: Nick G.

customer_reviews.title: Brightness of light great. have only had it a short time and ...
customer_reviews.text: Brightness of light great. have only had it a short time and it's already broken. Where you push it on and off at..the little button just went inside the whole tube. Had to take it apart to get battery out to turn off. The rubber cap just won't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Not the original ones .
customer_reviews.text: These flashlights aren’t the original ones . They’re still bright and work fine . BUT , the original ones you push the button to turn it on and off . If you half push the button , it goes through the different modes . These however , you have got to push the button five times to turn it off . They now go through all of the modes every time . The bulb look different also but seems to still be bright .
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Parham

customer_reviews.title: Bell + Howell 1176 Taclight High-Powered Tactical Flashlight with 5 Modes & Zoom Function
customer_reviews.text: Bell + Howell 1176 Taclight High-Powered Tactical Flashlight with 5 Modes & Zoom Function is a great item to have when traveling, hiking, out at night, or if the power goes out. You won't have an issue with it not being bright enough. The five modes are great for needing help, disorienting someone to give you time to get away, or provide the needed setting to use when you need it. I was amazed at how much brighter the flashlight was compared to the other flashlights I had in my home. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Weitoish

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product. I thought I ordered a brand new ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I thought I ordered a brand new one that was coming in the original package but instead I received one wrapped in bubble wrap in a tiny white box. It came without instructions so I had to play with it to figure out how the many gadgets worked. It came with a plastic tubing that I haven't figured out the purpose for or what it's used for. Perhaps you could answer that for me or send me some instructions?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: I received the flashlight on time. I did not open the box until the return time was passed. That's on me. I learned my lesson. When I opened the light to see why it wasn't working, I saw that one of the springs that is supposed to hold a battery in place was missing. Too late to return so I learned to open boxes when they arrive. Can't say if product is good or bad because it never worked.
customer_reviews.author: D. Teklemariam

customer_reviews.title: Poor design of the way the modes function
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight is bright, which I appreciate. Most of the time I just want a bright, steady beam. The problem is that every time you turn it off, and later turn it on again, it doesn't produce the steady beam, but it converts to the next mode, and then you have to click through all the modes until you get back to the steady beam. In addition, once you get back to the steady beam, sometimes it starts flashing on and off. I thought the other modes would be (occasionally) useful, but the way it's engineered is more annoying than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Betty W.

customer_reviews.title: Would give zero stars if possible. Battery caddie does ...
customer_reviews.text: Would give zero stars if possible. Battery caddie does not make proper contact with internal terminals therefore making it totally unreliable as to whether or not the light will power on. Unfortunately I threw away the packaging so am unable to return, do not buy this light.
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off when dropped
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of things that I really like about this flashlight--size, brightness, slim profile. I use it when walking my dog at night. But it shuts off instantly when dropped. Not a problem to recover it if you're standing under a streetlight, but defeats the purpose if you're actually out in a very dark stretch of neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these previously and really like it for camping. It’s small and lightweight but powerful. The second one I ordered, got shipped to me in silver which I don’t think looks as nice and sleek as the black one, and the picture showed a black flashlight which was what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Bell & Howell Taclight at a store recently, and liked it so much I decided to get another for my upstairs. So I went the Amazon route and ordered here. - The light I received today is NOT a Bell & Howell product. It came in a plain box, and lacks the Bell & Howell logo on the taclight. It seems to work okay, though not as well as the real thing. It does not shine as bright, nor do the different modes work well. I don't like being misled.
customer_reviews.author: taylorgirl

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Product description claims they are waterproof. They are NOT! Our 7 year old grandson took his in the pool for about 5 minutes. It no longer works. Deceptive!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Munson

customer_reviews.title: Small but great
customer_reviews.text: Very practical. Would definitely consider receiver of light prior to purchase. If prone to practical jokes - reconsider. The receiver of light really loves it, but loves to flash light into eyes of other people, not a good thing at best of times. Definitely worse if person is ready to drive vehicle. Light is bright and really lights things up for some distance.
customer_reviews.author: Sharriberry

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The Bell + Howell 1176 Taclight fell apart. It lasted only a couple months before a piece at a time either bent or broke and after trying to repair it I finally gave up. This light was used when I walked out of work, down dark streets to an even darker parking lot- this was for my security and safety. When it stopped working I realized it wasn’t even long enough to hit someone with if need be. This was an awful purchase and total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Donner

customer_reviews.title: behaved like something was loose
customer_reviews.text: 2 months in, behaved like something was loose. Changed battery still light frequently cut out like there was a loose connection or something. Oct 2017. Pushed power button to turn it on, whole button assembly pushed into the tube. Flashlight is now useless. There are certainly higher quality lights for the money. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: mfemenel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I just opned yesterday and the light just doesn't work! I am very desapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Vargas Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Bad switch. The switch would not want to turn ...
customer_reviews.text: Bad switch. The switch would not want to turn off the flashlight. I would cycle through the different functions but it would never turn off. It ate the first set of batteries and I had to unscrew the cap to turn the flashlight off. I'm trying the Atomic Light next to see if it's any better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light'em up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to catch a cat burger and shine this light on him to see him give up with his hands above his head like in the commercial. I haven't achieved this yet. This light is ok. It's not amazing.. I bought a surefire light a few years ago thats pretty bright. The only thing I really like about this flash light is the telescoping feature for the light. But the light source itself is nothing compared to my surefire.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good light.
customer_reviews.text: My wife saw the ad for this, and said "I want one". So I got one for her birthday (yeah, she doesn't want jewelry or perfume) . She had been using my flashlight I use for work to find the dogs in the yard at night, running down the batteries. Not sure if this is brighter than my 220 lumen Fenix, but it's pretty bright. And she likes the beam focus function. We'll see how well it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alberts

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one Switch goes bad quickly
customer_reviews.text: Working Uber it was Great..Projection Beam was Bright and could see addresses from street...somewhat annoying having to press button 3 times to shut off because it has blinking light and sos code feature...which is nice except for the fact you have to scroll through it every time you use it. Probably why switch fails in a very short time....will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Annoying operation
customer_reviews.text: Has 5 modes, but you need to cycle through them one by one. It's a pain to use. Off-high-off-medium-off-low-off-strobe-off-blinking-off. Won't be using much. First time it was dropped in water it filled up, and wrecked the circuits
customer_reviews.author: J. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: flashlight didn't work. battery's didn't fit seller doesn't even want feedback Amazon wont allow a poor review
customer_reviews.author: robert thunholm

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product, reasonable price, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this flashlight for taking the dog out at night, power outage, etc. i hoped for a decent product, but wasn’t sure how well it would work. I can say with certainty that this is the BEST flashlight I’ve ever had. I love the strobe effect (its just me and my 80 yr. old mother in the house, so anything with a safety feature is appreciated), and the option to choose high, low or medium illumination. It looks and feels like a high-quality product and I feel sure it will last a long time. I’m plan buy a few more so I can give them to family members. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Taclight it is everything they advertise it to be. I bought 2 of them. One to keep in my vehicle and the other I used to take my Great Dane out in the wee hours of the morning. When I would take her out at 2:00 or 3:00am I would light our path and it made it so much easier to see exactly where we were going. I live in a rural area and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie69

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: No good but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tina C.

customer_reviews.title: A flashlight that will give me light when needed
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the light Bell & Howell has given me. The flashlight & Lantern will come in handy for most of the flashlights do not give you a real stream of light when needed. I love the size as well. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Lillian A Barbera

customer_reviews.title: Received a used item...no directions
customer_reviews.text: I paid full price for this item, and it came used - it was in a plain white box taped up with no directions or warranty paper. I have no idea how to use the zoom function or put in the batteries because it had no directions. I can't even be sure it's what I actually ordered. I did not pay for a used item. I will try to return it for a new item with directions.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.  Too small and not enough lumens
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Not enough lumens for me. Very small handheld light.
customer_reviews.author: Herman F. East

customer_reviews.title: what a joke
customer_reviews.text: batteries not included, which is not what I expected. I bought for my wife's car, her respnose was just another thing to by batteries for, keeping one and sending on back
customer_reviews.author: j.j.

customer_reviews.title: Need to hold button down for light to work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this flashlight. While it's lightweight, bright, and the zoom function is great, it stopped working after the first week unless you hold the button down to shine the light.
customer_reviews.author: rosygirl

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the product, it worked as promised. Now only a couple months later when I needed a flashlight. It didn't work. I changed the batteries. Nothing. There wasn't anything we did that made it work. I would definitely NOT recommend this product. It's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Compact, but very bright!
customer_reviews.text: I have always kept flashlights handy, but this little compact flashlight is great; I love the 5 modes and how easy and light it is to handle since I'm 84 yrs. old. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not Marked Bell & Howell
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to be a Father's Day gift, but the one I received was not marked B&H anywhere. It is not as bright as advertised. Came in a thin, white box the same size as the flashlight - not the packaging shown in the listing. It did have a small sticker on the box that says B&H, but I don't believe for one minute that it's a legitimate B&H Taclight. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, small & light-weight
customer_reviews.text: All the different light functions work well. The only small detail is you have to run through all of them before turning it off.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia G

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertiesed
customer_reviews.text: Literally useless. They are bright. I ordered 2. Only 1 worked. But it would only strobe every 5th try. Sending these back as they are a waste of money. The advertising in the TV commercial is obviously false
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Taclights
customer_reviews.text: Yes, we received the flashlight and really like it. It is so bright. We do plan on ordering another one in the future. We also like the taclight lanterns.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Brightness is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best flashlight, great size with a good grip and the brightness is amazing! Best product I’ve purchased in a while!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom. The taclight is small, not heavy and very bright. The beam is very clear with no dark spot in the center like most flashlights. The only thing I would suggest is a longer lanyard. You cant put the lanyard around your wrist and hold the flashlight. Also, batteries are not included. Other than that I will be buying another one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: White_Rabbit808

customer_reviews.title: A small way of lighting your way.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller, yet just as bright, method of "seeing in the dark". Often switches modes ( eg. blinking ) on its own, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Moyse

customer_reviews.title: Good product, badly packaged
customer_reviews.text: Seems as advertised. Only problem is that the color was silver, not black, even though the box said "black". Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Eva L

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this flash light for my son and he loves it. He keeps it in his car. Our power went out during a storm and he brought it inside. This small flashlight was able to light up a whole room! He enjoys using the multi purpose extras I never knew were there.
customer_reviews.author: BMParis

customer_reviews.title: Great light.  Horrible pushbutton.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these and on both the pushbutton stopped working. I can get it to light if I unscrew the cap. Screw it back on and push the button twice quickly. If I push it once it will light for about 3 seconds. If I want to get it to work again I have to go through the same procedure. Sorry, not again.
customer_reviews.author: C. G.

customer_reviews.title: The brightness of the flashlight is not bad, there is one issue that causes me to ...
customer_reviews.text: The brightness of the flashlight is not bad, there is one issue that causes me to rate this light only two stars. This flashlight has 5 modes, unfortunately, in order to turn it off you have to cycle through all five modes. You can't turn it on and off quickly..... one click turns it on, then you have to push the button five more times to turn it off. It is a pain in the butt to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got what I paid for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one. Then, I bought a cheaper one. Didn't think it was as good, even though it was very similar. So, I bought 2 more of the Bell and Howell light! Haven't used it enuf to really answer the use questions, but like it well enuf to buy 3 of them
customer_reviews.author: D. Richard Artis

customer_reviews.title: GI Proven Mil Tech Light for Your Life
customer_reviews.text: Best searchlight, flashlight, As advertised, have not done the Ice or heat trick BUT bright. Many modes, worth the $$$$ vs plain flashlights. 2 bad cant sell say 4 for 1 price or more. Best deal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Russell

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light
customer_reviews.text: Good flashlight, but it's not as bright as I thought it would be. They need to make the light brighter!
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Total Junk
customer_reviews.text: Made of Air Craft Grade Aluminum- now that's tough! Boil it, freeze it, Drive over it, ......But Heaven forbid ......Do not drop it on a carpeted floor from 5 feet........ Total Junk!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This little flashlight really puts out a bright, wide stream. I was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hamman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son both have one of these. This purchase is for our daughter, who lives alone on a boat docked in a marina. We believe this is a must for her to have. This flashlight works exactly as advertised. We will be buying another to leave in our car.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P. Corona

customer_reviews.title: Received product in the mail and it did not work ...
customer_reviews.text: Received product in the mail and it did not work. Tried everything even several new batteries to no avail. Followed instructions exactly. Even had a friend go through process, would not work. I will not be ordering this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Riley

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. They fell apart under very light wear. Not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Flashing annoying turning off.
customer_reviews.text: It would have been a five if not for the flashing light while turning it off.
customer_reviews.author: L Clark

customer_reviews.title: This looked like the perfect flashlight but turns out it is a ...
customer_reviews.text: This looked like the perfect flashlight but turns out it is a dud. The light stays on for a short period of time and then goes out. I have to constantly hit the button to get it to go on again. Not a good flashlight as advertised. I would not recommend it to anyone. And, always replacing batteries. When it first goes on it is great, nice and bright, then out it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Tomanelli

customer_reviews.title: switch is junk
customer_reviews.text: Like the ad says, You can run over it with tanks and trucks. You just cannot turn it on or off because their switching mechanism is absolute junk!
customer_reviews.author: jms1911

customer_reviews.title: This is not a bell and bowel taclight
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bell and howel taclight this a cheap knockoff although it is almost is bright you need more than brightness it is not high quality like the real bell and howel taclight it doesn't have the name bell + howel on the side like the real one so don't buy if you want the real high quality of a real bell and howel taclight ps not near as sturdy as the real bell and howel taclight
customer_reviews.author: Andy Merts

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Did not come in the type of container that it shows. Came in a plan white box with NO directions as to how to even turn it on. Got very, very frustrated with it and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Belmonte

customer_reviews.title: good flashlight
customer_reviews.text: love the small size easy to use very bright and practical
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: A great item!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product Great to keep in the car when you get into an emergency...has flashing light you can use! Buying for all my daughters to keep in their cars
customer_reviews.author: kathy brockmann

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out
customer_reviews.text: It just wasn’t anywhere near bright enough for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wise

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Nice flash light. Pretty basic compared to the images. Great compact size. Looks good. Does the job. However, after minimal use, the switch started working incorrectly. it soon fell apart and could not be fixed. I foolishly paid $20 for it... It is worth less than $5.00.
customer_reviews.author: Customer-in-NY

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product thinking it was going to be like the one in the picture. It was not, mine was silver. I wanted black because it would not put off a high glare effect.. Very disappointed. If you're going to display a product it should be the one we see displayed or the one we ordered. But thanks anyway..
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks weird works good
customer_reviews.text: It came in its own little brown box not in an original bell + Howell box so it's not new. Doesn't feel like it's really strong to resist what it's suppose to but the light works well it's very bright and small for it to fit in pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe

customer_reviews.title: Light functions defaulty
customer_reviews.text: The brightest light setting (first click on) starts to flicker after 1-2 min. then flashes like a strobe light. The last setting, the stoble inconsistently flashes and then stops working altogether. Look, feel, size, brightness and other functions all very impressive. Just wish the light settings worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yes it is super bright, "day-maker"
customer_reviews.text: yes it is super bright, "day-maker", brighter than any small flashlight I have ever seen, but I am disappointed with quality of fit and finish, I am very skeptic that it will hold up to abuse and elements as seen on TV.
customer_reviews.author: Evan T.

customer_reviews.title: Careful, it's blinding!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible flashlight! If you like amazing gadgets buy this one. Best light I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap built unit. I bought two, one worked, one did not. One was a gift to my grandson, but when he got it it was too late to return. I should have paid more attention to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Dietsch

customer_reviews.title: Power button issues after 30 days.
customer_reviews.text: After one month of use. They will not come on.... Change batteries and they will work fine. Turn off (completely) and turn back on again and they just flash really fast. Remove the battery holder and re install and will work correctly until after a couple of uses or letting sit for a few minutes, then back to the rapid flash in initial power up. Seems to be and issue with the switch button.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Klear

customer_reviews.title: A product that actually lives up to its hype.
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that actually lives up to its hype. The price has come down a lot since I bought mine which makes it an even better deal.
customer_reviews.author: The Old Guy

customer_reviews.title: When it worked it was great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a year then button fell apart and didnt work
customer_reviews.author: hzdv86

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Light.....
customer_reviews.text: Super duper bright and light. I got this for an amazing deal around Father's Day on the "Todays's Deals". I actually got it for my husband but I ended up keeping it. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Unlucky13

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This sucker is BRIGHT! Don't let it shine in your eyes; it'll do you damage. I don't imagine that the strobe settings will be very handy, but I use the flashlight for studio photography and it works just fine. Heavy metal construction – seems like it'll last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Ed F.

customer_reviews.title: did not last
customer_reviews.text: quit working 6 months after buying. hardly used. changed batteries and still does not work. would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: RanB

customer_reviews.title: couldnt use
customer_reviews.text: Tried 2 of these and could not get them to work. Doesn't come packed as displayes
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Brightness doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Out of the package this thing is great. It’s very, very bright. After about 9 months that brightness is gone. I’ve tried changing the batteries, but it hasn’t helped.
customer_reviews.author: V. Strother

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: This small flashlight fell apart as I opened the box and I was unable to get it to stay together. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mason

customer_reviews.title: the light shown in the darkness
customer_reviews.text: This tactical flashlight works well, on par with the two other brands that I own. It performs as advertised. It is easy to operate, light, compact, and emits very bright light. It is a good item to keep in your car for emergencies at night.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: The best flashlight ever
customer_reviews.text: The best flashlight ever!! Every house and car should have a few of the durable flashlights. The light is crisp and clear, great for security. We tested the light in our back yard and if was unbelievable how easy you can see on a night without the moon. I will enjoy this to walk at night and it will be great if we ever have a power outage. My husband who is hard to please loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Marney

customer_reviews.title: Great but it came damaged and we had to send ...
customer_reviews.text: Great but it came damaged and we had to send back and reorder. Once the new one came, it was great!
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: On & Off Button is a bad design!
customer_reviews.text: As much as I wanted to like this flashlight, I can't. The on/off function is garbage. The orange button is way too easy to push in. This is a major design flaw. Of course, by the time I noticed that it was a hunk of junk, it was dark, and I couldn't put it back together if I tried (mostly because, well, I didn't have a light!)... If I could get a refund I would, but unfortunately, the 30 days have passed.
customer_reviews.author: CT Hone, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: won't last mort than 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Product should have lasted long time but it has fallen apart and no longer works now!! Would not buy this brand!!! Very unhappy!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I used this flashlight only a few times and batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this flashlight only a few times and batteries did not last more than 30 minutes. When I tried to replace bateries (first time) a spring that secure one of three batteries simply fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mcyszyn

product_meta.title: Bell + Howell 1176 Taclight High-Powered Tactical Flashlight with 5 Modes & Zoom Function,Black
product_meta.description: 1176 Features: -40x Brighter than the average flashlight. -5 Modes. -Waterproof. -Zoom function. Product Type: -Flashlight. Lantern Type: -Electric. Color: -Black. Dimensions: Overall Height - Top to Bottom: -6". Overall Width - Side to Side: -2". Overall Depth - Front to Back: -2". Overall Product Weight: -0.5 lbs.
feature_bullets: High-power: Taclight is made from air-craft grade aluminum and can withstand extreme temperatures from freezing to boiling. It is water-proof and shock resistant
Modes: High brightness; medium brightness; low brightness; Strobe (intermittent flashing); SOS (emergency signal)
Functional: Taclight has built-in zoom function and high-powered bulbs are 22x brighter than your regular flashlight (2 nautical mile visibility)
Portable: 5.4 inches L x 1.6 inches width. Taclight is small enough to fit in your pocket, handbag, or car compartment, so you can take it with you wherever, whenever
Energy-efficient despite the high-powered functionality Taclight is environment-friendly and cost-efficient. Bulbs last more than 100,000 hours
